availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Crawford Stephens (Hickman County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Jonathon Stephens and Elizabeth Stephens. Married to Mary C. Wright Stephens. Father of John A. Stephens, James M. Stephens, Joseph Stephens, and William Stephens. Laborer in Monroe County, Arkansas, in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Arkansas, Monroe County, Jackson, p. 371B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 511.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 177C.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 29053.
